html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-04032023-05-04102022FIN
ActBudget Implementation Act, 2022, No. 1
SubjectOrder Fixing the Day After the Day on Which this Order is Made as the Day on Which Division 28 of Part 5 of the Act Comes into Force
PrecisOrder fixing the day after the day on which this Order is made as the day on which Division 28 of Part 5 of the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2022, NO. 1, Chapter 10 of the Statutes of Canada, 2022, COMES INTO FORCE in order to bring into force amendments to the Canada Pension Plan that ensure the correct calculation of benefits for the Post-Retirement Disability Benefit and the child-rearing and disability drop-ins.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Fixing the Day After the Day on Which this Order is Made as the Day on Which Division 28 of Part 5 of the Act Comes into Force
precis: Order fixing the day after the day on which this Order is made as the day on which Division 28 of Part 5 of the BUDGET IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2022, NO. 1, Chapter 10 of the Statutes of Canada, 2022, COMES INTO FORCE in order to bring into force amendments to the Canada Pension Plan that ensure the correct calculation of benefits for the Post-Retirement Disability Benefit and the child-rearing and disability drop-ins.
